overview: Amelie is emotionally unstable. One day after her father leaves her home alone, she goes out and takes Clovis, her 4 years old boy from kindergarten in mid-day. The two go for 'a day of fun' in the woods near town. Amelie is emotionally unstable. One day after her father leaves her home alone, she goes out and takes Clovis, her 4 years old boy from kindergarten in mid-day. The two go for 'a day of fun' in the woods near town, where Amelie's juvenile behavior puts her son and herself in great danger.
tagline: Unable to control her emotions, Amelie takes her 4 years old boy for a trip in the woods to calm herself down.
title: Dead Leaves
